h1_title: Best Settings on PS5 and PC
content: Reflections should be set to very high, mainly because at all other levels you’ll see the introduction of an odd flicker on objects that are reflecting. This could be a part of the issue we mentioned for ray tracing, so Very High is the way to go here. Going lower than Very High also nets very little gain in performance, so go for the visual upgrade if you’re able.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Best_Settings_on_PS5_and_PC.md', within the main section titled 'Best Settings on PS5 and PC'.
The content is as follows:
Reflections should be set to very high, mainly because at all other levels you’ll see the introduction of an odd flicker on objects that are reflecting. This could be a part of the issue we mentioned for ray tracing, so Very High is the way to go here. Going lower than Very High also nets very little gain in performance, so go for the visual upgrade if you’re able.
